iati-activity.title: WaterAid Rwanda
iati-activity.description: We began working in Rwanda in 2009. Our first steps were to register WaterAid and build our profile within the country. We have now recruited a team leader who will set the strategic direction of the programme.In Rwanda, all intervention is coordinated by the government, who ensure each organisation is contributing to the country plans. Our work includes improving accessibility to water, sanitation and hygiene services, sector monitoring and building the technical capacity of partner organisations.
iati-activity.activity-date: Financial year that WaterAid (re)started activities within the country
